item.title: Copenhagen Student 101 - A guide to studying and surviving as a foreign student in Copenhagen, Denmark
item.description: Introduction In August 2022, I moved from my hometown Bremen in Germany to Copenhangen, Denmark, in order to start my Master’s Degree studies in Computer Science at the University of Copenhagen, after finishing my B.Sc. Degree in Computer Engineering in 2021. Early on, I started with the preparation of my stay abroad and gathered information about administrative tasks, but also student life advices. For that, I used several different sources, but soon found the information landscape to be quite scarce.
